Transformation Wizard Avant-Garde:
You must remember that once you have transformed, you must not go into deep water. Once you have reverted to your original form, your soul will need time to recover -- you will not be able to transform again for some time. Understand?
Other than that... Each individual soul contains its own unique chaiacter. If you transform into something that matches that character, you may earn some benefits. Think of it as wearing a suit of clothes that fit you perfectly. Every race has its own respective "figure," so I advise you to do a little research about what kind of transformation would fit you best.
